MONOLITHIC TORMENT.title: SNUF
MONOLITHIC TORMENT.credits:
released May 15, 2020
This is a track I recorded for my very great very amazing friend who passed away this week. Colin, you may have left this world but you will never leave our hearts <3 I will see you again when I catch that west bound train. gone to soon :( Love you buddy.

MONOLITHIC TORMENT.title: DEAD PLUG
MONOLITHIC TORMENT.credits:
released December 16, 2019
When I was 25 I overdosed on heroin at a dealers house in Austin Texas I had never went through prior. After I fell out I guess the dealer said to get rid of me,to throw me in the alley. My friend Ross was with me and hit me with narcan and got me the fuck out of there and safe. He saved my life that day when two other people wanted to throw me in the trash. I am so glad I had the chance to be your friend and I owed you my life. Rest easy old friend.
Ross Weller 11/20/1988 - 11/17/2018

trackinfo.title: Discarded Like A Dirty Needle (RIP) Ross Weller
trackinfo.credits: from DEAD PLUG, released December 16, 2019

trackinfo.title: ROT IN SHIT YOU SICK FUCK
trackinfo.credits: from HUMAN FUCKING TRASH, released November 23, 2021
